definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
confident and at ease/free and easy
to sprinkle/to shed (tears, blood etc)/fig. free, unconstrained/to write in a free style

sentences.english: All you need is a shortcrust pastry, a well made egg custard, and a sprinkling of nutmeg.
sentences.chinese: 所有你需要的只是，一个油酥松饼，蛋，和肉豆蔻洒。

sentences.english: The shower head drizzled water on my head.
sentences.chinese: 莲蓬头把水像下毛毛雨似的洒在我头上。

sentences.english: I've upset a cup of coffee on my shirt.
sentences.chinese: 我打翻了一杯咖啡，洒在我的衬衫上了。

sentences.english: I woke up this morning to sunshine streaming through my window and my spirits lifted immediately.
sentences.chinese: 今早醒来看到阳光从窗户洒进来，精神立刻为之一振。

sentences.english: He was so busy clocking her that he spilt a glass of beer over the table-cloth.
sentences.chinese: 他只顾目不转睛地盯着她，竟把一杯啤酒洒在桌布上。

sentences.english: When the grill is ready, toss the rosemary sprigs directly on the fire.
sentences.chinese: 当烤架准备好，直接将迷迭香洒在火上。

sentences.english: Remove the pot from the heat and stir in the cilantro and green onions.
sentences.chinese: 从炉上端开锅子，洒上芫荽叶和葱。

sentences.english: Then he put more on and rubbed the back of his neck.
sentences.chinese: 然后他再洒了点，在脖颈上揉擦着。

sentences.english: It's like putting perfume on a pig.
sentences.chinese: 这就像往猪猡身上洒香水。

sentences.english: Pamela told me to sprinkle shouts, timely rain.
sentences.chinese: 向我洒来甘美的喊叫，及时雨。

sentences.english: Shake up the salad-dressing before you put it on.
sentences.chinese: 把色拉调味汁摇匀再洒在色拉上。

sentences.english: Sprinkle a thick layer of borax over the stain.
sentences.chinese: 向污渍上面洒一层厚厚的硼砂。

sentences.english: Splashed on your bare branches are my tears like bloodstains.
sentences.chinese: 独把花锄偷洒泪，洒上空枝见血痕。

sentences.english: Roll rice into circular shape, press to make patties, sprinkle sesame on top.
sentences.chinese: 将饭搓成球状，压扁成米饼状，在上面洒上芝麻。

sentences.english: When I splash the dinner soup onto my clothes.
sentences.chinese: 当我把菜汤洒到自己衣服上时。

sentences.english: I am the gentle showers of rain, on Westfall' s fields of golden grain.
sentences.chinese: 我是温和滑腻的雨，洒在西部荒野的金色稻田。

definition: to pour liquid/to irrigate (using waterwheel)/to water/to cast (molten metal)/to mold
to smear/to wipe/to erase/classifier for wisps of cloud, light-beams etc
muddy/covered in (mud, dust, sweat, blood etc)/daubed in
to moisten/to be infected by/to receive benefit or advantage through a contact/to touch
(of a vapor etc) to rise/to hang in the air
